description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: As a result of the proposed development, the cubic content of the roof space would exceed the cubic content of the existing roof space by more than 50 cubic metres. The proposed development therefore falls outside the parameters of Paragraph B.1(d)(ii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
Please provide Proposed Sections of  main building at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of the entire property not just part and showing dimensions.
